summaries.veryShort: Watchlist stance: bullish bias, watching C, JPM, WFC, MRK, SPY, TSLA, NVDA, QQQ for follow-through.
summaries.mainIdea: Risk tone was risk-on: breadth 84% up / 15% down / 1% flat, VIX 13.4 (-4.9%), top10 concentration 65% of $vol, breakouts 18 up / 0 down (20/55/252d). Volatility was muted (median 1d move 0.3 ATR; ≥1 ATR: 0; ≥2 ATR: 0). No high-conviction technical trades met the filter today; focus is on watchlist follow-through.
